requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bits or higher
  • Processor: Pentium B940 2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (Sandy Bridge) or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: * The game requires the "Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2022 redistributable x64" package for Steam features linked to the game to work properly. (Steam has to install it automatically the first time you run the game) * Minimum requirements based on a test environment consisting of a fresh install of Windows with 4gb ram, a resolution of 1366x768 and running the game with the image option selected on normal (default). * The game may run on lower processors or graphics cards, but depending on the hardware characteristics, screen resolution and image mode selected within the game, the game experience may not be optimal.
